smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses

instances.message: Parentheses in (service == Service.CARDDAV && capabilities.contains("addressbook")) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: service == Service.CARDDAV && capabilities.contains("addressbook")
Parentheses in (service == Service.CALDAV && capabilities.contains("calendar-access")) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: service == Service.CALDAV && capabilities.contains("calendar-access")
Parentheses in (e is InterruptedIOException && e !is SocketTimeoutException) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: e is InterruptedIOException && e !is SocketTimeoutException
Parentheses in (!httpsRequired && scheme.equals("http", true)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: !httpsRequired && scheme.equals("http", true)
Parentheses in (colorWithAlpha shr 24) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: colorWithAlpha shr 24
Parentheses in (this - other) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: this - other

Parentheses in (i != 0) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: i != 0
